title: LoL wont open
body: This has been happening for a while now and sometimes will launch, sometimes wont. Every time i got to open the LoL patcher the logo appears for a second then disappears and nothing will happen. Ive tried everything reinstalling the game, deleting everything in RADS/projects etc. nothing has helped if anyone can help with the fix it would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there lakiyah,

Have you already tried launching the game as Admin and/or running in compatibility mode? This can sometimes fix the issues you're describing.

This could also potentially be an issue with your connection to Riot's servers, required for launching the game.

Could you change your computer to [use a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me and let me know if that helps.
